item.description: AddressesCheckList.vy # vyper: 0.2.10 Events # CommitOwnership admin : address, notIndexed ApplyOwnership admin : address, notIndexed Methods # transferOwnership # type: nonpayable function gas: 37651 Sets new future owner address Callable by owner only Arguments: _futureOwner: - New future owner address applyOwnership # type: nonpayable function gas: 38507 Applies new future owner address as current owner

BoostingController.vy # vyper: 0.2.11 author: Dispersion Finance Team license: MIT Boosting Controller Events # Boost account : address, notIndexed amount : uint256, notIndexed lockTime : uint256, notIndexed Unboost account : address, notIndexed amount : uint256, notIndexed CommitOwnership admin : address, notIndexed ApplyOwnership admin : address, notIndexed Methods # boost # type: nonpayable function

Controller.vy # vyper: 0.2.11 author: Dispersion Finance Team license: MIT Controller Controls liquidity Reaper's and the emission of coins through the Reapers. Add/remove Reaper from voting/emission. Events # StartMinting owner : address, notIndexed AddReaper reaper : address, notIndexed RemoveReaper reaper : address, notIndexed CommitOwnership owner : address, notIndexed ApplyOwnership owner : address, notIndexed Methods # init # type: nonpayable constructor

InitialEmissionDistributor.vy # vyper: 0.2.11 author: Dispersion Finance Team license: MIT Initial Emission Distributor Events # CommitOwnership owner : address, notIndexed ApplyOwnership owner : address, notIndexed StartClaiming ts : uint256, notIndexed Claim account : address, notIndexed amount : uint256, notIndexed Methods # transferOwnership # type: nonpayable function gas: 37771 Transfers ownership by setting new owner _futureOwner candidate

Reaper.vy # vyper: 0.2.11 author: Dispersion Finance Team license: MIT Reaper Events # Deposit account : address, notIndexed amount : uint256, notIndexed feeOptimization : bool, notIndexed Withdraw account : address, notIndexed amount : uint256, notIndexed Kill admin : address, notIndexed Unkill admin : address, notIndexed CommitOwnership owner : address, notIndexed ApplyOwnership

VotingController.vy # vyper: 0.2.11 author: Dispersion Finance Team license: MIT Voting Controller For voting, Reaper's from Controller are used. Ð¡ontrols voting for the distribution of farm token emission by Reaper's. Events # Vote reaper : address, notIndexed coin : address, notIndexed account : address, notIndexed amount : uint256, notIndexed Unvote reaper : address, notIndexed coin : address, notIndexed account : address, notIndexed amount : uint256, notIndexed StartVoting

WhiteList.vy # vyper: 0.2.11 author: Dispersion Finance Team license: MIT White List Events # CommitOwnership admin : address, notIndexed ApplyOwnership admin : address, notIndexed AddAddress _address : address, notIndexed RemoveAddress _address : address, notIndexed Methods # init # type: nonpayable constructor Contract constructor owner = msg.sender. addAddress # type: nonpayable function gas: 37847
